data.comment: The match is underway in Columbus.
Chicago to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
In the minute 2, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Columbus.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
Can Columbus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chicago's half?
In the minute 9, Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Chicago needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Chicago.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Chicago in the half of Columbus.
Columbus's Luis Diaz breaks free at Mapfre Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Chicago at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 15, Columbus advance rapidly upfield but Guido Gonzales Jr blows for offside.
Free kick Chicago.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 17, Chicago are coming forward and Przemyslaw Frankowski gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Columbus have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 19, Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Derrick Etienne gives Columbus a 1-0 lead in Columbus.
Great play from Milton Valenzuela to set up the goal.
In the minute 21, Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Chicago a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Chicago in the half of Columbus.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of Chicago.
In the minute 28, The match at Mapfre Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jonathan Mensah, who is down injured.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 29, Columbus's Jonathan Mensah looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Mauricio Pineda (Chicago) has received a yellow card from Guido Gonzales Jr.
Columbus are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 32, Important block from the Columbus defence as Ignacio Aliseda fires in a strike for Chicago.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for Chicago, close to Columbus's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Chicago in Columbus.
In the minute 33, Djordje Mihailovic (Chicago) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Chicago drive upfield and Ignacio Aliseda gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Columbus defender.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Chicago.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Free kick Columbus.
In the minute 40, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Chicago throw-in in Columbus's half.
Luis Diaz of Columbus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Columbus to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
In the minute 41, Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, An attacking Columbus player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Guido Gonzales Jr has blown to start the second-half.
Chicago will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Columbus.
In the minute 48, Chicago's Francisco Calvo has been booked in Columbus.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Columbus a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Chicago's Djordje Mihailovic is on target but unsuccessful.
Columbus have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Chicago at Mapfre Stadium.
Chicago needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Columbus to check on Djordje Mihailovic, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 58, Chicago have a goal kick.
Djordje Mihailovic for Chicago is back on the field again.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Elliot Collier (Chicago) has replaced the possibly injured Djordje Mihailovic.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 65, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for Chicago, close to Columbus's area.
Sebastian Berhalter is replacing Luis Diaz for the home team.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago.
In the minute 68, Milton Valenzuela (Columbus) has received a first yellow card.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Columbus have a dangerous throw-in.
Caleb Porter is making the team's second substitution at Mapfre Stadium with Emmanuel Boateng replacing Derrick Etienne.
Free kick Columbus.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Columbus!
Chicago have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Goal! Columbus extend their lead to 2-0 through Darlington Nagbe.
That's a fine assist from Gyasi Zardes.
In the minute 83, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Chicago throw-in in Columbus's half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago.
Brian Gutierrez is on a sub for Mauricio Pineda for Chicago.
Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Goal! Gyasi Zardes extends Columbus's lead to 3-0.
Pedro Santos instrumental with a fine assist.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
The home team replace Gyasi Zardes with Fanendo Adi.
Brandt Bronico is replacing Alvaro Medran for Chicago at Mapfre Stadium.
Caleb Porter (Columbus) is making a fourth substitution, with Chris Cadden replacing Pedro Santos.
